com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler

Interface RestErrorResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRestErrorResolver

    public interface RestErrorResolver
    A RestErrorResolver resolves an exception and produces a RestError instance that can be used to render a Rest error representation to the response body.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    DefaultRestErrorResolver

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RestError resolveError(org.springframework.web.context.request.ServletWebRequest request, java.lang.Object handler, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Returns a RestError instance to render as the response body based on the given exception.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveError

        RestError resolveError(org.springframework.web.context.request.ServletWebRequest request,
                     java.lang.Object handler,
                     java.lang.Exception exception)
        Returns a RestError instance to render as the response body based on the given exception.
        Parameters:
        request - current ServletWebRequest that can be used to obtain the source request/response pair.
        handler - the executed handler, or null if none chosen at the time of the exception (for example, if multipart resolution failed)
        exception - the exception that was thrown during handler execution
        Returns:
        a resolved RestError instance to render as the response body or null for default processing
